Name: FindDark
About the game: About FindDark This is a storytelling based one first person horror game. As the protagonist, you wander around many places and unravel the secrets that happen in this game. There are vast story and horror elements. And find the hidden darkness. You have to go through a lot of places to find something. There are horror factors that are hindering you from moving forward. You should find a way to escape from the confined space and proceed to the next stage. About how to proceed Become the main character in a movie-like content and achieve your purpose. This game is not difficult, just walk around in the game and experience and enjoy what is happening. It's not terribly frightening and nothing difficult. Just for the story to take place in the game you'll have to play. There is a demo It would be good to play the trial version in advance to see what kind of game the original version is. Get to know the mood of the gameplay and see if you can enjoy it enough The way of the game The way the game progresses is to escape from where you are and move on to the next level. Enjoy what happens when you take actions to escape from there. Supernatural things and characters are featured in this game. Sometimes it can be a surprise. Be aware of this. The game is divided into Part 1 and Part 2. Part 2 is scheduled to be released as dlc in the future. [Full support for xbox controllers will be updated two weeks after the game is released.]
